definition: following or accompanying as a consequence, an item that is incidental
details:
adjective
- following or accompanying as a consequence
= synonyms: attendant
- not of prime or central importance
= synonyms: nonessential
- (sometimes followed by `to') minor or casual or subordinate in significance or nature or occurring as a chance concomitant or consequence
= example: (sometimes followed by `to') minor or casual or subordinate in significance or nature or occurring as a chance concomitant or consequence
= synonyms: incident
noun
- an item that is incidental
- an expense not budgeted or not specified, frequently seen in plural form
= example: an expense not budgeted or not specified, frequently seen in plural form
= synonyms: incidental expense, minor expense
